mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, userid, content, DATE_FORMAT(start, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S') start, DATE_FORMAT(end, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S') end, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR, spaceid FROM calendar where spaceid = #{spaceid}
mapper.insert: insert into calendar (title, writer, userid, content, start, end, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR, spaceid) values( #{title},#{writer},#{userid},#{content}, STR_TO_DATE(#{start},'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S'), STR_TO_DATE(#{end},'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%S'), #{allDay}, #{textColor}, #{backgroundColor}, #{borderColor}, #{spaceid})
